channel.title: I have just started a server and would like to create a website
channel.description:
Firstly - What do i need to start my website? Besides a domain
Secondly - Can anyone give me a recommendation where to get them?
Finally - Can anyone help me design the website?

item.title: I have just started a server and would like to create a website
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Biz.nf is really obnoxious with their terms and conditions, I personally wouldn’t recommend them.
Two good hosts from past experiences are X10Hosting and HostGator.

Read full topic
item.source: I have just started a server and would like to create a website

item.title: I have just started a server and would like to create a website
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

https://secure.biz.nf/order.php?type=host&plan=3

It’s for a free http://www.yournamehere.co.nf (comes with file manager, mysql, unlimited .co.nf’s i think)

Enjoy, it’s better than a free .tk

Read full topic
item.source: I have just started a server and would like to create a website

item.title: I have just started a server and would like to create a website
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,617112.0.html

Read through that.

Besides a domain you need a webhost, there’s quite a few out there on offer. X10premium have always been good to me, give them a try.

Read full topic
item.source: I have just started a server and would like to create a website
